snippet: The new year began on an optimistic note after the House approved a deal to resolve the fiscal showdown. | The Avis Budget Group is buying Zipcar for $500 million. | The winners and losers of the past year gathered in spirit for DealBook's annual...
abstract: The new year began on an optimistic note after the House approved a deal to resolve the fiscal showdown. | The Avis Budget Group is buying Zipcar for $500 million. | The winners and losers of the past year gathered in spirit for DealBook's annual "Closing Dinner." | The coming year will likely feature more white-collar cases, as several big investigations remain active.
